input_loading_capacity: input the loading capacity of the truck
input_truck_size: input the size of your truck
loading_capacity_less_than_or_more_than_: loading capacity cannot be less than 18 tonnes or more than 33 tonnes
loading_capacity_more_than_truck_size: loading capacity cannot be more than the truck size
truck_size_less_or_more: the truck size cannot be less than 18 tonnes or more than 33 tonnes
